projects.title: The Foschini Group
projects.description: React Native Android and iOS E-commerce App. One of the most exciting applications I had the opportunity to work on. I've learned many technologies and skills on this project.

projects.title: Checkers
projects.description: I've contributed to the front-end developement of the Checkers rewards app and Spin2Win gamification. The Spin2Win project won silver in the 2021 SA Smarties Awards, in the Mobile Gaming, Gamification & E-Sports category. I'm very proud to have been a part of that. I also contributed in the development of a web-based content managemet system built in React JS and stored in Firebase, where Checkers could update content relating to current specials, promotions, themes, banners, terms and conditions, etc.

projects.title: Ovex
projects.description: Ovex is the first cryptocurrency exchange project that I have worked on. It was challenging, exciting and interesting learning about the industry by building their system. In this project, aside from front-end, I learned how to integrate endpoints in the backend using GraphQL.
